ya10.3.2:1.1_0: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ parijānittha so domanassindriyaṁ pajahitthāti? Āmantā.
ya10.3.2:2.1_0: Yo vā pana domanassindriyaṁ pajahittha so cakkhundriyaṁ parijānitthāti?
ya10.3.2:4.1_0: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ parijānittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvitthāti? Āmantā.
ya10.3.2:5.1_0: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvittha so cakkhundriyaṁ parijānitthāti?
ya10.3.2:7.1_0: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ parijānittha so aññindriyaṁ bhāvitthāti? Āmantā.
ya10.3.2:8.1_0: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ bhāvittha so cakkhundriyaṁ parijānitthāti? Āmantā.
ya10.3.2:9.1_0: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ parijānittha so aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikaritthāti?
ya10.3.2:10.1_0: Yo aggaphalaṁ sacchikaroti so cakkhundriyaṁ parijānittha,
ya10.3.2:10.1_2: Yo aggaphalaṁ sacchākāsi so cakkhundriyañca parijānittha aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarittha.
ya10.3.2:11.1_0: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarittha so cakkhundriyaṁ parijānitthāti? Āmantā.
ya10.3.2:12.1_0: Yo domanassindriyaṁ pajahittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvitthāti? Āmantā.
ya10.3.2:13.1_0: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvittha so domanassindriyaṁ pajahitthāti?
ya10.3.2:14.1_2: Tayo puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvittha domanassindriyañca pajahittha.
ya10.3.2:15.1_0: Yo domanassindriyaṁ pajahittha so aññindriyaṁ bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.2:17.1_0: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ bhāvittha so domanassindriyaṁ pajahitthāti? Āmantā.
ya10.3.2:18.1_0: Yo domanassindriyaṁ pajahittha so aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikaritthāti?
ya10.3.2:20.1_0: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarittha so domanassindriyaṁ pajahitthāti? Āmantā.
ya10.3.2:21.1_0: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvittha so aññindriyaṁ bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.2:23.1_0: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ bhāvittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvitthāti? Āmantā.
ya10.3.2:24.1_0: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvittha so aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikaritthāti?
ya10.3.2:26.1_0: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvitthāti? Āmantā.
ya10.3.2:27.1_0: Yo aññindriyaṁ bhāvittha so aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikaritthāti?
ya10.3.2:28.1_0: Yo aggaphalaṁ sacchikaroti so aññindriyaṁ bhāvittha,
ya10.3.2:28.1_2: Yo aggaphalaṁ sacchākāsi so aññindriyañca bhāvittha aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarittha.
ya10.3.2:29.1_0: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarittha so aññindriyaṁ bhāvitthāti? Āmantā. (Aññindriyamūlakaṁ.)
ya10.3.2:30.1_0: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānittha so domanassindriyaṁ nappajahitthāti?
ya10.3.2:31.1_2: Cha puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha domanassindriyañca nappajahittha.
ya10.3.2:32.1_0: Yo vā pana domanassindriyaṁ nappajahittha so cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānitthāti? Āmantā.
ya10.3.2:33.1_0: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.2:34.1_2: Dve puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.2:35.1_0: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvittha so cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānitthāti? Āmantā.
ya10.3.2:36.1_0: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānittha so aññindriyaṁ na bhāvitthāti? Āmantā.
ya10.3.2:37.1_0: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ na bhāvittha so cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānitthāti? Āmantā.
ya10.3.2:38.1_0: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānittha so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikaritthāti? Āmantā.
ya10.3.2:39.1_0: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha so cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānitthāti?
ya10.3.2:40.1_0: Yo aggaphalaṁ sacchikaroti so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha,
ya10.3.2:40.1_2: Aṭṭha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha.
ya10.3.2:41.1_0: Yo domanassindriyaṁ nappajahittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.2:42.1_2: Dve puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahittha anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.2:43.1_0: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvittha so domanassindriyaṁ nappajahitthāti? Āmantā.
ya10.3.2:44.1_0: Yo domanassindriyaṁ nappajahittha so aññindriyaṁ na bhāvitthāti? Āmantā.
ya10.3.2:45.1_0: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ na bhāvittha so domanassindriyaṁ nappajahitthāti?
ya10.3.2:46.1_2: Cha puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāvittha domanassindriyañca nappajahittha.
ya10.3.2:47.1_0: Yo domanassindriyaṁ nappajahittha so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikaritthāti? Āmantā.
ya10.3.2:48.1_0: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha so domanassindriyaṁ nappajahitthāti?
ya10.3.2:49.1_2: Cha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha domanassindriyañca nappajahittha.
ya10.3.2:50.1_0: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvittha so aññindriyaṁ na bhāvitthāti? Āmantā.
ya10.3.2:51.1_0: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ na bhāvittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.2:52.1_2: Dve puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāvittha anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.2:53.1_0: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvittha so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikaritthāti? Āmantā.
ya10.3.2:54.1_0: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.2:55.1_2: Dve puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.2:56.1_0: Yo aññindriyaṁ na bhāvittha so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikaritthāti? Āmantā.
ya10.3.2:57.1_0: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha so aññindriyaṁ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.2:58.1_0: Yo aggaphalaṁ sacchikaroti so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha,
ya10.3.2:58.1_2: Aṭṭha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha aññindriyañca na bhāvittha.
